value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">22</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="inline">
            <l>
              <choice>
                <sic>An</sic>
                <corr>And</corr>
              </choice> tis a pretty toy to be a poet..</l>
          </quote>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">So distended with rapture, the tune changes</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">effectively.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Could he stop, he would cutdeeper. But there is no pause;</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">no shadow. The 
            <choice>
              <sic>pagenat</sic>
              <corr>pageant</corr>
            </choice> <add hand="ms" place="above">[illeg.]</add>. The horses neigh.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Kings and 
            <choice>
              <sic>Empeors</sic>
              <corr>Emperors</corr>
            </choice> emerge. Battles are fought. Blood flows.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">And all over this 
            <choice>
              <sic>multitidionous</sic>
              <corr>multitudinous</corr>
            </choice> splendour broods 
            <choice>
              <sic>agedy</sic>
              <corr>tragedy</corr>
            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">xmxmxmmxmxmxxx We forbode. We behold the thing as <add hand="ms" place="above">We [illeg.] there</add></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">spectacle. There is the end to come. Meanwhile, let us 
            <choice>
              <sic>boas</sic>
              <corr>boast</corr>
            </choice></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">and triumph.</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="inline">
            <l>Our souls, whose faculties can comprehend</l>
            <l>The wondrous architecture of the world,</l>
            <l>And measure very wandering planets course</l>
            <l>Still climbing after 
              <choice>
                <sic>knowlede</sic>
                <corr>knowledge</corr>
              </choice> 
              <choice>
                <sic>infinute</sic>
                <corr>infinite</corr>
              </choice>,</l>
            <l>And always moving as the restless 
              <choice>
                <sic>spe eres</sic>
                <corr>spheres</corr>
              </choice>,</l>
            <l>Well us to wear ourselves, and never rest...</l>
          </quote>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">That is the 
            <choice>
              <sic>meldy</sic>
              <corr>melody</corr>
            </choice> the marching song of this brave</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <choice>
              <sic>septacle</sic>
              <corr>spectacle</corr>
            </choice>. And yet, as if the poet slipped the noose of his</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">audiences, 
            <choice>
              <sic>releved</sic>
              <corr>relieved</corr>
            </choice> himself of its pressure for one moment,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">we hear:</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">amid the 
            <choice>
              <sic>so nding</sic>
              <corr>sounding</corr>
            </choice> brass:</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="inline">
            <l>What is 
              <choice>
                <sic>beautym</sic>
                <corr>beauty,</corr>
              </choice> saith my sufferings, then?</l>
            <l>If all the pens that ever poets held</l>
            <l>Had fed the 
              <choice>
                <sic>feelingsx</sic>
                <corr>feelings</corr>
              </choice> of their masters' thoughts,</l>
          </quote>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">.....</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="inline">
            <l>If all these had made one poems 
              <choice>
                <sic>riod</sic>
                <corr>period</corr>
              </choice>,</l>
            <l>And all combined in 
              <choice>
                <sic>b auty's</sic>
                <corr>beauty's</corr>
              </choice> worthiness,</l>
            <l>Yet should there hover in their 
              <choice>
                <sic>estless</sic>
                <corr>restless</corr>
              </choice> heads</l>
            <l>one thought, one wxxxxxxx grace, one wonder, at the least,</l>
          </quote>
